results.title: From fear to success
results.creator_credit: Phillip Martinovski, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: When Phillip Martinovski had to go to Copperfield’s senior campus, he was incredibly nervous, so much so that on the first day he spent a lot of time standing outside the gates, debating whether to ‘wag’. In the end, he threw himself him and talks about his time at Copperfield College Senior School, in the hope that he can students like him overcome their fears.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Phillip Martinovski, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: When Phillip Martinovski had to go to Copperfield’s senior campus, he was incredibly nervous, so much so that on the first day he spent a lot of time standing outside the gates, debating whether to ‘wag’. results.title: Never give up
results.creator_credit: Haris Fazlic, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Haris Fazlic got sick of being larger than his classmates and took up exercising and, eventually, discovered his passion for wrestling. This passion has driven him to win many times despite having to overcome a major obstacle on the way. Wrestling has taught Haris that you should never give up on something you love, no matter what.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Haris Fazlic, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Change
results.creator_credit: Michelle Huynh, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Michelle Huynh’s high school years were peppered with having to change schools. In that, she had to adjust to a new area, and more importantly, make new friends. In time, Michelle has learnt to see the changes she dreaded so much as a good thing.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Michelle Huynh, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: My special family
results.creator_credit: Erin Wilson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Erin Wilson pays tribute to her special family, a family who have taught her all about life. From her family, Erin has learnt responsibility, empathy, the realities of life and death and, most importantly, love and friendship. Here she pays tribute to the members of this special family.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Erin Wilson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Erin Wilson pays tribute to her special family, a family who have taught her all about life. results.title: Glory and fame
results.creator_credit: Ayesha Lai, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Ayesha Lai came from a big family from many different cultures. But one thing her family shared is their love for Australian Rules football. Ayesha tells of how she developed her passion for the game, through her brothers and reading about the great Indigenous footballers who played for Essendon. Eventually she threw her support behind the club, which culminated in meeting and talking with Kevin Sheedy.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Ayesha Lai, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Ayesha Lai came from a big family from many different cultures. But one thing her family shared is their love for Australian Rules football. Ayesha tells of how she developed her passion for the game, through her brothers and reading about the great Indigenous footballers who played for Essendon. Eventually she threw her support behind the club, which culminated in meeting and talking with Kevin Sheedy.

results.title: Prayer for fame
results.creator_credit: Angela Josifoska, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Angela Josifoska, a teenager living in Melbourne’s western suburbs, tells of her quest for fame. She shares her early youth and the things that interested her throughout her life, culminating in a passion for performance. She candidly shares her dreams and ambitions for the future and her determination to succeed shines through.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Angela Josifoska, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Angela Josifoska, a teenager living in Melbourne’s western suburbs, tells of her quest for fame. She candidly shares her dreams and ambitions for the future and her determination to succeed shines through.

results.title: Just smile and shine
results.creator_credit: Anna Huynh, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Anna Huynh tells of how she learned the hard way the pitfalls of trying to fit in. Looking different to everyone else, she tried doing everything her peers were doing and it took her further away from herself. In being true to herself, she discovered the true friendship and, ultimately, her true self.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Anna Huynh, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: The Bribe
results.creator_credit: Ashlea Thomas, Legacy and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description: It took the bribe of a new phone by her mother to convince Ashlea to go on a Legacy camp. As much as she missed her father, she didn’t want his death to define her. At the camp, Ashlea started to make friends and became a member of Legacy, which she has been a part of ever since.

results.title: A New path
results.creator_credit: Verity Hollingworth, Legacy and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description: After realising that something was missing in her corporate job, Verity took a short term contract with Legacy and has been with them ever since. She talks about the care, diligence and passion of her fellow workmates and how working for Legacy has brought her closer to her own family and her family’s history.

results.title: My journey
results.creator_credit: Michelle Johnstone, Legacy and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description: Dad taught me about photography, cooking, Geelong Football Club and Legacy. Michelle tells of how she joined as a junior legatee and how being a member of legacy has given her the confidence in life and has helped her to become who she is today.
